attributes.action: Boris Johnson to lockdown the UK NOW
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is facing the biggest crisis since WW2. If drastic measures are taken by Mr Johnson this nation could have a REALISTIC chance of getting through this GLOBAL CRISIS relatively unscathed.
DO NOT LET THE UK FOLLOW THE PATH OF ITALY OR SPAIN!
TAKE ACTION NOW
SUPPORT OUR NATION
SAVE OUR SOULS
attributes.background:
This is a GLOBAL CRISIS Boris Johnson should be taking drastic measures to stop the transmission of COVID 19 in the UK. 
If the entire country is forced to isolate for a month with immediate effect there is a REALISTIC chance of the UK pulling through this.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that everyone should stay at home to prevent the spread of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
